title: Грешницы на перевоспитании
overview: "Sinners on re-education" is a reality show in which 8 escorts and kept women want to change, regain themselves and stop "loving" men for money. In order to improve, they go to a monastery for a month and come out of it new."Sinners on re-education" is the most provocative and confessional reality show this fall on the channel "Yu".
